page.title: 01Neatishead & Barton Turf
page.content:
A predominantly arable farming area between the villages of Neatishead and Barton Turf.
At Neatishead a navigable dyke (Limekiln Dyke) runs from the village into the confluence of Barton Broad and thence into the River Ant.
Neatishead village has the traditional Norfolk village sign, a post office, public house, licensed restaurant and a public mooring staithe.
Barton Turf has a general store. Barton Church lies between the villages. Neatishead Church is two miles from Neatishead village.
